resources.string: contact_shield_demo
MainActivity
Home
Dashboard
Notifications
FAQ
Settings
"I have not tested positive."
"I tested positive for Covid-19."
"How are interactions calculated?"
"We use Bluetooth LE to sense how close you are to other users who also has the app downloaded. If we estimate that you have been within 6 feet of other users we record an interaction."
"What happens when I self-report a positive test?"
"With your permission, anonymous alerts will be sent to the people who have been near you and have potentially been exposed to the virus."
"When will I get alerted?"
"Whenever anyone anonymously self-reports a positive test, we alert people who we think may also be exposed to the virus."
"Where can I get tested?"
"Covid-19 tests can be done at the testing centers and health departments. To get tested, contact your state and local health department or your medical provider"
"Does this App really work without my personal information?"
"Anonymity is our top priority. No personal details are required when you download and use the App."

"If you have been tested positive for COVID-19, you can share your test results to help notify others who may have been in contact with you. This will let others know they should monitor for symptoms. Only those who have been exposed will receive a notification."
"This unique verification code is provided by your testing center, and it is used to verify your positive test result."
"Your test date helps the app know when you may have been contagious and notify others who have been in contact with you from the past 14 days."
"When the App is disabled, your device will not send or receive signals from other users."

"When Periodic Key upload is disabled, the device will stop uploading your periodic keys to the server, and others will not be able to download your periodic key if you are tested positive. New periodic keys will be generated and stored locally on the device."
"When notifications are turned off, your device will not receive any notifications for potential exposures or interactions with other users."

string.name: alert_heading
string.b: "You have been in contact with a Covid-19 Patient!"

resources.string: "Someone you have been in contact with recently have self-reported positive. Please self-quarantine or get tested at your local testing center."
"Choose Verification Method"
"Scan QR code"
"Register your test by scanning the QR code that can be found in your testing documents."
"Request TAN code"
"Please call us if you have been diagnosed of COVID-19 but do not have a QR code."
"How this works"
"Call the hotline to request a TAN:"
